> Find the voltage transfer function T_V(s) = V_2(s)/V_1(s) in Figure P11–9.

### Transfer function

Dette er to spændingsdelere i serie:

Deler 1:
$$
H_1(s) = \frac{R}{L+R}
$$

Deler 2
$$
H_2(s) = \frac{\frac{1}{Cs}}{\frac{1}{Cs}+R}
$$


Dermed kan $T_V(s)$ findes ved
$$
T_V(s)= H_1(s)\cdot H_2(s)
$$
Altså
$$
T_V(s) = \frac{R}{Ls+R} \cdot \frac{\frac{1}{Cs}}{\frac{1}{Cs}+R}
$$

$$
\boxed{
T_V(s) = \frac{R}{CLRs^2+(CR^2+L)s+R}
}
$$
